articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Marked
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture here Tuesday to mark the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					Present there were senior party, army and state officials, chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, persons of merit and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					Vice Marshal of the KPA Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces who is member of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, in a report made at the meeting said that holding Kim Jong Il at the highest post of the revolutionary armed forces made it possible to steadily advance the Juche-oriented cause of army building started by President
						Kim Il Sung generation after generation, steadfastly carry forward the history and tradition of the Korean revolution which has emerged victorious thanks to the Songun politics and thus successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He said that the path of the revolution along which  Kim Jong Il has led the revolutionary armed forces in the DPRK, shouldering the heavy responsibility as supreme commander of the KPA, is a significant course in which he put the Juche-oriented cause of army-building on a new high stage, thus turning the KPA into an invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and a glorious history in which        he has brought an epoch-making miracles and changes in the do-or-die struggle to defend socialism and build a rich and powerful nation by pulling through the unprecedentedly grim difficulties under the uplifted banner of Songun.   
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has wisely led the work to ensure that a radical turn was brought about in the efforts to increase the roles of the party organizations and political organs of the People's Army in every way, establish the Party leadership system throughout the army and implement the Party's military line of self-defence in the early period of his leadership over the army.  He unrolled a programme for modeling the whole army on the Juche idea as required by the mature demand for the development of the Korean revolution, which called for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea, thus opening up a new history of the cause of Juche-based army building aimed at turning the KPA into a genuine army of the leader and an army of the Party.  
					
					 He has developed the KPA into core ranks and a main force for the Juche-oriented revolution and brought about epoch-making miracles and changes in the struggle for defending socialism and building a great prosperous powerful nation, thereby laying an eternal foundation for achieving boundless prosperity of the country and nation, guided by the great Songun idea and with energetic Songun revolutionary leadership. These revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Jong Il will shine forever along with the history of the country. 
					
					 The reporter called for successfully attaining the Party's magnificent goal to fling open without fail the gate of a great prosperous powerful nation in 2012 which will commemorate the centenary of birth of the President. 
					
					 A grave situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the hostile policy of the U.S. imperialists and their followers toward the DPRK and their frantic moves to ignite a war of aggression against it, he said, and continued: 
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces have already made a solemn declaration that they would counter the enemies' slightest moves for "preemptive attack" with more rapid and powerful advanced preemptive strike of our style.  
					
					 The pro-American warmongers of south Korea hell-bent on igniting another war had better stop their rash acts, bearing in mind that Korean-style preemptive attack based on striking means unimaginably more powerful than nuclear weapons will prove to be the most decisive and merciless strike based on justice as it will not merely turn everything into a sea of fire but reduce everything treacherous and anti-reunification to debris and build an independent reunified country on it. 
					
					 Should the U.S. hard-line conservative forces and the bellicose forces of south Korea dare ignite another war of aggression against the DPRK, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will mobilize all the military potentials reinforced by dint of Songun and remove the main source of war from the peninsula and thus accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of Palestinian National Authority
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of Palestinian National Authority
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Mahmoud Abbas, Chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and the New Year Juche 98 (2009).
					 It was handed to an official concerned by Riyad Shehadeh, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Palestinian embassy here, Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 They were handed to an official concerned by military attache of the Vietnamese embassy here Dau Xuan Long, doyen of the corps, on December 23. 
					
					On the same day, Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the economic and commercial councilors' corps here on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of
						Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 They were handed to an official concerned by Enrique Gomez Soler, commercial councilor of the Cuban embassy here who is also doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Wreath Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here placed a wreath before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Dec. 23 on the occasion of the 91st anniversary of her birth.
					 The guests presented the wreath with profound reverence for her before paying silent tribute to her.
					
					Written on the ribbon of the wreath were letters "The revolutionary exploits of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk are immortal!"

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Korean Revolution Museum
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Korean Revolution Museum
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of embassies of different countries here visited the Korean Revolution Museum on Tuesday on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					Being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung energetically worked till the last moments of his life for the prosperity of the country, happiness of people and the reunification of the country and that  Kim Jong Il has wisely led the People's Army and people of the DPRK in the struggle to defend socialism and build a great prosperous powerful nation with his Songun revolutionary leadership, they went round photos, historic relics and data with keen interest. 
					
					 After the visit Ibrahim Abu Mualek, first secretary of the Palestinian embassy here, wrote in the visitor's book that Kim Jong Il has developed the Korean People's Army into an invincible revolutionary army and wisely led the struggle of the Korean people for building a great prosperous powerful nation with his original Songun politics. 
					
					 Enrique Montoto Cruz, first secretary of the Cuban embassy here, wrote that the visit helped him keenly realize that the army and people of the DPRK are achieving great successes in defending the country and building a great prosperous powerful nation under his Songun leadership.

articles.title: Significant Day of DPRK Celebrated by Young People and Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Significant Day of DPRK Celebrated by Young People and Agricultural Workers
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings of youth and students and agricultural workers took place at the Central Youth Hall and in Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province on Dec. 22 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 A reporter and speakers at the meetings noted that holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the Korean revolutionary armed forces marked the great auspicious event of the nation that reliably guaranteed the future destiny of the country and the people and a landmark event that guaranteed the future sure victory of the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 Kim Jong Il possessed of extraordinary military wisdom and outstanding commanding art has developed the People's Army into the vanguard devotedly defending the leader and an invincible revolutionary army, thus putting the Juche-oriented cause of building army on a new higher stage, they said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has prepared the youth and students as reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche and true personnel in the Songun era by pursuing the politics of attaching importance to the youth as well as the politics of attaching importance to the army.
					
					 They called on all the youth and students to glorify their life through the worthwhile struggle to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and to protect the country and build an economic power true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A reporter and speakers at the meeting of agricultural workers noted that Kim Jong Il laid down an original policy of agricultural revolution and has led the People's Army to play a vanguard role in implementing the policy, thus bringing about a signal turn in the socialist rural construction and agricultural production.
					
					  They called for effecting innovations in the overall agricultural production by displaying ardent patriotic zeal and making devoted efforts.
					
					 Among those present at the meetings was Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jung Rin.

articles.title: Art Performances Given
articles.content:
Art Performances Given
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given under the sponsorship of working people's organizations on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the art squad of the C.C. of the Union of Agricultural Workers staged colorful numbers including a poem and chorus "General of Korea", female vocal solo "Oh, My Motherland of Songun" and male vocal solo and pangchang "Mother Is Always with Red Flag".
					
					 The performers in their programs sang high praises of the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by demonstrating the dignity and might of Juche Korea with his unique Songun politics and the undying feats Kim Jong Suk performed by dedicating herself to the country and revolution. 
					
					 In the male chorus, an accordion solo and pangchang and a female duet and other numbers, they truthfully represented the revolutionary enthusiasm of the working class, the members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, youth and agricultural workers to emerge victors in the struggle to defend socialism of Juche and the all-out charge for building an economic power true to the Songun leadership of   Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Meanwhile, members and officials of the Korean Democratic Women's Union held a concert.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials of the working people's organizations.

articles.title: Greetings to Indian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Indian FM
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Dec. 10 sent a message of greetings to Indian Foreign Minister Pranab Mukherjee on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and India.
					Noting that the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations have steadily developed in various fields for the past 35 years, the message sincerely wished the Indian government and people bigger successes in their efforts for the stability and development of the country and the welfare of the people.

articles.title: Chinese Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Ambassador Gives Reception
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming gave a reception at his embassy in honor of officials of media on Monday on the occasion of New Year, Juche 98 (2009).
					Present there on invitation were Kim Jung Hyop, editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, and other officials of media.
					
					 Staff members of the Chinese embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					Earlier, Liu Xiaoming gave receptions in honor of officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on the occasion of New Year.
					
					Invited there were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Vietnamese Army Day Marked
articles.content:
Vietnamese Army Day Marked
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Le Van Cu, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps on Monday on the occasion of the army day of Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, general officers and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Staff members of the Vietnamese embassy were present there.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Lots of New Books See Light
articles.content:
Lots of New Books See Light
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Lots of books have been published and distributed in the DPRK this year.
					 More than 50 kinds of immortal works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il were published or reprinted as of the end of November.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" came off the press to be very popular among the members of the Workers' Party of Korea and other working people.
					
					 New books helpful to the education in the revolutionary traditions were brought out and various books were reprinted and enlarged editions of books came off the press.
					
					 60 kinds of books helpful to the education in the revolutionary traditions including Vols. 71-77 of "Among the People" dealing with the President's wise leadership and noble virtues were published or reprinted as of early in December.
					
					 This year also witnessed the publication and distribution of lots of diverse socio-political books and literary and art books. Among them are books praising the greatness of the WPK and others helpful to the revolutionary education and working class education and books that help readers deeply understand the Korean history and the world history.
					
					 Newly published and distributed are full-length novels including "A Prelude to Spring" from a cycle of novels "Immortal Leadership" representing Kim Jong Il's revolutionary history, "Women's Song" from a cycle of novels "On the Road of Loyalty" representing the anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk's revolutionary history and "Star over the Wide Plain" depicting the indomitable revolutionary fighter Kim Chol Ju's revolutionary history.
					
					 This year also saw the publication of various other novels and collections of poems.

articles.title: Great Leadership for Giving Full Play to People's Mental Power
articles.content:
Great Leadership for Giving Full Play to People's Mental Power
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Seeing out this year, a year of great turn, which will shine in the annals of the country, the Korean people, with deep emotion, are looking back upon the immortal service of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has led their efforts to build an economic power to victory.
					Since he guided on the spot the workers in their work for constructing the Ryesonggang Power Station on a cold and windy day in the beginning of the year, he has covered without rest the road of field guidance in order to celebrate this year on which the 60th anniversary of the DPRK fell as a significant year in the history of the nation.
					
					In January he called at the Kanggye Pig Farm and Janggang Mushroom Farm and many other units to inspire the working people who launched a dynamic labor campaign from the outset of the year. He also indicated the road for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, continuing his on-the-spot guidance to various units of the national economy all the year round.
					
					While looking round the February 8 Vinalon Complex which had been updated to meet the requirements of the new century and was mass-producing goods, he set forth tasks and ways for increasing the variety of chemical products needed for the economic development of the country and the life of the people. At the Taegyedo tideland reclamation site, he heightened the revolutionary enthusiasm of the builders there so as to complete the project at an early date.
					
					At an enterprise he congratulated workers of merit on their distinguished service in the production and had a photo taken with them and on the Unhung Co-op Farm in Thaechon County, North Phyongan Province he met Om Jong Sil, a model farmer and a model agitator, who had volunteered to the farm from Pyongyang and bestowed benevolent affection to be conveyed to the posterity upon her. His field guidance has produced many legends on his human love.
					
					 He has continued on-the-spot guidance without interruption defying the intense cold of the midwinter and the blazing sunlight and rainy days of midsummer. It has implanted in the minds of the people the steel-firm belief that they will emerge victorious only when they are led by Kim Jong Il and let them display all their mental power stronger than the nuclear weapon to effect a creation and change on this land.
					
					The Korean people had made great successes in all sectors of the socialist construction by constructing or rebuilding more than 140 major objects, monumental edifices, throughout the country on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK through the accelerated general march of the Songun revolution, and thus demonstrated the dignity and might of the country to the whole world.
					
					He does not cease his field guidance even in December. This news further strengthens the people's confidence in and optimism for the victory of the revolution.
					
					The Korean people will certainly build a great, prosperous and powerful nation on this land by giving full scope to the indomitable mental power under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and demonstrate the dignity and honor of the Kim Il Sung's nation to the whole world.

articles.title: Deceptive and Reactionary Nature of U. S. Touted "Defense of Human Rights" Disclosed
articles.content:
Deceptive and Reactionary Nature of U. S. Touted "Defense of Human Rights" Disclosed 
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The United States is apt to pay lip-service to "protection of human rights", "democracy" and "peace" on one hand and busy massively selling various type arms and equipment to different other countries to meet its interests on the other.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					The weapons exported by the U.S. are as harmful as "cancer" as they are used for disturbing peace and security and blocking democratic development and prosperity as evidenced by the facts that they are sparking and escalating armed conflicts in the relevant regions and countries, taking the lives of so many civilians and straining the situations there.
					
					 According to data available, a daily average of five ethnic conflicts is reported worldwide and four of them were sparked by the parties concerned by use of the arms and equipment imported from the U.S.
					
					This being a hard reality, the United States is shamelessly pulling up other countries over "the human rights records," behaving as if it were "a human rights judge." Moreover, it is perpetrating such high-handed and arbitrary practices as putting unreasonable political pressure and economic sanctions upon other countries under the pretext of "protecting human rights". Some other Western countries are supporting it.
					
					The United States and the West seem to consider the "human rights" as a lever for attaining their unjust selfish aims and a veil for covering up their black-hearted intentions.
					
					But their hypocritical talk about "human rights" can never work in this bright world and no country will be taken in by it.
					
					 The human rights that should be given priority and respected are being ceaselessly infringed upon and are becoming targets of the plots hatched by political charlatans precisely because of such country as the United States and the forces blindly following it.
					
					 Only stern judgment of history awaits the United States as it is obstructing democratic development, prosperity and the guarantee of human rights and disturbing global peace and security in pursuance of its sinister aim, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Black-hearted Intention and Perverted View on Fellow Countrymen Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Black-hearted Intention and Perverted View on Fellow Countrymen Flayed
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, the puppet minister of National Defence let loose a spate of such jargons betraying his grievance and wickedness that the north "will never be recognized as a nuclear weapons state."  The group of traitors went the lengths of talking nonsense that the north "should be re-listed as a state sponsor of terrorism" as regards the results of the recent six-party talks.
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is no more than the impertinent behavior of those steeped in inveterate hostility toward fellow countrymen and the idea of confrontation to the marrow of their bones.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group is talking this or that after poking their noses into the matter which they have nothing to do, a revelation of their sinister intention to stand in the way of settling any issue of fellow countrymen.
					
					 The U.S. announcement that the DPRK is a nuclear weapons state reflects the stark reality, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 In a sense, the U.S. recognition of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state might provide the south Korean authorities with a justification and an occasion for making a switchover in the anachronistic "policy toward the north" shaped by them under the pretext of the nuclear issue.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group, however, are finding fault with that development, further escalating the inter-Korean confrontation. This clearly indicates that the Lee group do not want the reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification between the north and the south but intend to keep to the road of confrontation with fellow countrymen and war of aggression against the north, clinging to the coattails of the U.S.
					
					 Their preoccupation is to offend and do harm to fellow countrymen at any cost. It is, therefore, the height of folly for them to call for "dialogue."
					
					 The black-hearted intention of the Lee group and their wrong view on fellow countrymen go to prove that they have no will to truly have dialogue and cooperate with the north.
					
					 Those going against the trend of the times are fated to meet self-destruction.
					
					 The group would be well advised to face up to the reality and behave themselves.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Meet Anti-Reunification Forces' Challenge
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Meet Anti-Reunification Forces' Challenge
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The prevailing situation calls on the Koreans in the north and south of Korea and abroad responsible for national reunification to unite close as one and stage a more dynamic drive to meet the challenge of the separatist forces inside and outside Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun today urges this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					Without removing hurdles from the way of independent reunification it is impossible to achieve national unity, reunification and prosperity.
					
					The U.S. domination and interference in south Korea are a stumbling block in the way of independent reunification. The U.S. imperialists have pursued a separatist policy aimed at dominating the Korean nation after keeping Korea divided into two permanently and have not hesitated to sacrifice Koreans with an eye to realize their strategy for world hegemony ever since the very day of their occupation of south Korea.
					
					The U.S. military presence in south Korea and its moves to perpetuate Korea's division have lasted for more than half a century, throwing an obstacle in the way of the Koreans' movement for achieving independent reunification.
					
					The U.S. warmongers are getting frantic in their moves to launch a war of aggression against the DPRK in league with the south Korean puppets, straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. adventurous moves to provoke a war are increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula and gravely threatening the Korean nation's cause of independent reunification.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime's moves to escalate the inter-Korean confrontation are laying grave obstacles in the way of independent reunification. "A policy toward the north" persistently followed by the Lee group despite the strong public protest and denunciation at home and abroad irrefutably proves that it is a confrontational declaration totally negating the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and obstructing their implementation.
					
					The reality clearly testifies to the fact that it is impossible to achieve their cherished desire for independent reunification, peace and prosperity as long as the Lee group is allowed to stay in power, running amuck to do harm to the fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces, swimming against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: Conflicts between Ruling and Opposition Parties Fester in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conflicts between Ruling and Opposition Parties Fester in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Grand National Party of south Korea, a party of the puppet conservative forces, is working hard to railroad all sorts of undemocratic laws through the "National Assembly" within the year, according to CBS and KBS of south Korea.
					The GNP gentries termed what happened when "the motion calling for the ratification of south Korea-U.S. FTA" was brought for discussion at the NA on Dec. 18 "rowdyism of anti-U.S. elements" and threatened to "strongly deal" with this.
					
					 The floor leader of the GNP, addressing a meeting of the "committee of measures for examining bills" held inside the puppet National Assembly on December 19, asserted that if the above-said FTA is not cleared within 2008, this will create big confusion, adding that the action taken the previous day to put the matter on the agenda of the session was an unavoidable measure.
					
					 The Democratic Labor Party in a statement branded the GNP's unilateral passage of the above-said motion through the meeting of the "Committee of Foreign Affairs and Trade and Unification of the National Assembly" as "a tyrannical parliamentary action that completely ignored the people's opinion" and declared its will to carry on the vigorous struggle to deter the "motion" from passing through the NA.
					
					The representative of the Democratic Party of south Korea said that the Lee Myung Bak regime is an incompetent government that deepened the economic crisis in less than one year of its office and a regime that sparked a double crisis as it brought democracy and the inter-Korean relations one or two decades back.
					
					A spokesman for the Democratic Party of south Korea charged that only lawmakers from the GNP gathered and unilaterally brought up the above-said motion for discussion and declared this arrogant action totally null and void.
					
					Legislators from the Democratic Party of south Korea occupied the room of the speaker of the puppet National Assembly on Dec. 19 before entering into a sit-in strike to hold in check the anachronistic wrongdoings of the GNP going against democracy and the unilateral discussion of the said "motion."

articles.title: Suppression of Progressive Forces Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Progressive Forces Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Measure Committee for Frustrating the Crackdown upon Participants in Candlelight Actions, Moves for Scrapping the June 15 Joint Declaration and October 4 Declaration and the Plot to Fake up a Case for Suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea made public a statement on Dec. 18 to denounce the puppet prosecution authorities for their suppression of progressive forces.
					The statement accused the prosecution authorities of demanding a fine for Kang Ki Gap, representative of the Democratic Labor Party, on the charge of violation of the "law on election."
					
					Such rash action taken by the prosecution is touching off indignation among all the people, the statement said, adding that this goes to clear prove that the "government" and the ruling party are all out to "liquidate the Democratic Labor Party."
					
					Lee Myung Bak and the Grand National Party of south Korea are regarding the above-said party as a thorn in their flesh as it has struggled against the dictatorial policy, it charged, branding the above-said case as a politically-motivated retaliation and suppression of the Democratic Labor Party.

articles.title: GNP's Dissolution Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
GNP's Dissolution Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea released a statement entitled "Dissolve the Grand National Party, a high-handed party" on Dec. 19.
					The statement accused the GNP group of bringing up the "motion calling for south Korea-U.S. FTA" for the discussion at the "National Assembly" on Dec. 18 after totally blockading the conference hall and using even fire extinguishers, in the wake of railroading the "bill on reducing taxes" and the budget bill for 2009 through it. This is touching off public protest at home and abroad, it noted, and continued:
					
					This high-handed action taken by the GNP gentries termed "a military operation" is nothing but a fascist dictatorial action aimed at attaining their despicable political and strategic purpose in utter disregard of the people's will.
					
					What the GNP rammed through the NA calls for selling off the destiny of the nation to the U.S., serving the rich only and killing the common people, it deplored.
					
					It demanded the GNP make an apology to the people and dissolve itself immediately.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Bulgaria, a briefing and a film show in Iran and lectures in Romania and Ethiopia between Dec. 12 and 15 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					Atanas Ivanov, chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, in his speech at the meeting highly praised the Korean people for having defended the sovereignty of the country and successfully carried on the cause of socialism while foiling the U.S. wild ambition to dominate the world as they hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 He expressed his belief that the Korean people would build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the peaceful reunification of the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans free from the foreign interference under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il true to the behest of President Kim Il Sung and the desire of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					The secretary general of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran at the briefing and film show said that Kim Jong Suk made an immortal contribution to the liberation of Korea and the cause of building a new country.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA was an event of special mention in bolstering the KPA, he said that the DPRK has achieved signal successes in various fields despite the imperialists' moves to stifle it entirely thanks to Kim Jong Il who directed primary efforts to strengthening and developing the KPA to cope with the prevailing situation.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association in a lecture said that the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il is the source of strength that made it possible for the Korean people to defend socialism and guarantee the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation with armed forces. 
					
					 The representative of the Romanian branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain introduced in detail the undying feats anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk performed by devotedly protecting Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically and at the risk of her life and giving birth to and bringing up Kim Jong Il as a bright future of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched the DPRK documentary showing the military parade of the KPA.
					
					A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Acto central por el 24 de diciembre
articles.content:
Acto central por el 24 de diciembre
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este martes en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 17o aniversario del nombramiento (24 de diciembre) del Dirigente
					Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de los partidos amigos, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del EPC, funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, benemeritos y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El informe de ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Kim Il Chol, miembro del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					Gracias a la llegada del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a la jefatura suprema de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, se hizo posible llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche al impulsar energicamente de generacion en generacion la autoctona empresa de construccion del ejercito iniciada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y dar firme continuidad a la historia y tradiciones de la revolucion coreana, que vino marchando victoriosamente con el Songun (priorizacion militar), comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					La trayectoria revolucionaria de la guia del Dirigente sobre las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias en calidad de Comandante Supremo del EPC es la sagrada en que convirtio al EPC en las invencibles fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu desarrollando en la nueva etapa mas alta la autoctona causa de construccion del ejercito.
					
					Ademas, resulta la historia orgullosa en que trajo milagros y cambios seculares en la batalla de vida o muerte por defender el socialismo y en la construccion de una patria prospera superando las dificultades mas severas que nunca levantando en alto la bandera del Songun. Ya en la etapa inicial de su direccion sobre el ejercito, el Comandante Supremo lo oriento sabiamente a producir un cambio revolucionario en la lucha por elevar en todos los sentidos el papel de las organizaciones del partido y los organos politicos, establecer en todo el ejercito el sistema de direccion del partido y materializar la linea militar del caracter autodefensivo del PTC.
					
					Ademas, presento el programa de transformacion de todo el ejercito segun la idea Juche conforme a que el impulso de esta labor en toda la sociedad devino una demanda propicia del desarrollo de la revolucion coreana dando inicio a la nueva historia de la autoctona causa de construccion del ejercito, o sea, la conversion del EPC en el autentico del lider y del partido.
					
					Seran eternas en los anales de la patria las hazanas revolucionarias del Comandante Supremo, quien echo la eterna base de la infinita prosperidad de la patria y la nacion al formar al EPC como la columna vertebral y el grueso de la revolucion jucheana y registrar milagros y cambios seculares en la defensa del socialismo y la lucha por la construccion de una gran potencia prospera en virtud de la magna idea del Songun y mediante su incansable direccion sobre la revolucion segun esta.
					
					Todos nosotros debemos materializar exitosamente la grandiosa meta del partido de abrir sin falta en el ano 2012, en que se cumple el centesimo aniversario del nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, la puerta que de acceso a la gran potencia prospera 
					
					Hoy dia, debido a la politica hostil a la RPDC de los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus satelites y las freneticas maniobras para provocar la guerra de agresion, en nuestro pais se da una grave situacion.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias declararon ya solemnemente que responderian a cualquier movimiento pequeno de "ataque preventivo" de los enemigos con el avanzado ataque preventivo a nuestro estilo que sera mas rapido y mas potente que el primero.
					
					Los belicistas proyanquis del Sur de Corea enloquecidos por provocar la nueva guerra deben portarse con prudencia dandose cuenta de que el inimaginable ataque preventivo a nuestro estilo, basado en el medio ofensivo mas potente que el arma nuclear, sera el golpe de justicia mas resuelto e implacable que generara no un simple mar de llamas sino reducira a cenizas todo lo antinacional y anti-reunificacion y construira sobre estas ruinas una patria independiente y reunificada.
					
					Si las fuerzas conservadoras e intransigentes de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos se atreven a provocar la nueva guerra de agresion contra la RPDC, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de esta eliminaran en la Peninsula Coreana la causa de guerra explotando todo el potencial militar consolidado mediante el Songun y cumpliran sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de jefe de autoridad de Palestina
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de jefe de autoridad de Palestina
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 17o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, del 91o aniversario del natalicio de la heroina de lucha antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y del Ano Nuevo del 98 (2009) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente recibio un cesto de flores que le dirigiera el Jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas.
					El encargado de negocios a.i. del Estado de Palestina en Corea, Riyad Shehadeh, lo entrego el dia 23 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica "defensa de DDHH" al estilo norteamericano
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica "defensa de DDHH" al estilo norteamericano
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El periodico Minju Joson divulgo este martes un comentario individual que sigue:
					Si bien Estados Unidos habla mucho a la luz publica de la "proteccion de DDHH", la "democracia" y la "paz", se enfrasca a espaldas en la venta en gran medida de pertrechos militares de diversos tipos a varios paises del mundo persiguiendo sus intereses.
					
					Los armamentos exportados por el imperio fomentan el conflicto armado en las regiones y paises convulsos, causan la muerte de muchos civiles inocentes y agravan la situacion.
					
					Por lo tanto, devienen el factor pernicioso que destruye la paz y la seguridad y frena el desarrollo democratico y la prosperidad.
					
					Segun estadisticas ya trascendidas, 4 de los 5 conflictos fratricidas, que acontecen en la arena internacional como promedio diario, son desatados por las partes contendientes que adquirieron las armas hechas en EE.UU.
					
					A pesar de esta realidad, EE.UU. siempre anda cuestionando atrevidamente la "situacion de DDHH" de otros paises como si fuera el "juez" de esta materia.
					
					Para colmo, bajo el pretexto de la "defensa de DDHH", ejerce la injusta presion politica y aplica el bloqueo economico contra otros paises, entre otras, muestras de coercion y arbitrariedad.
					
					Se suman a esta campana norteamericana algunos paises occidentales.
					
					Parece que EE.UU. y el Occidente consideran los "derechos humanos" como aparato para alcanzar sus injustas metas egoistas y velo para encubrir su malsana intencion.
					
					La defensa de "derechos humanos" preconizada por ellos no pasa de ser un embuste que ya no puede enganar a ningun pais del mundo actual tan claro.
					
					Debido a EE.UU. y las fuerzas que le siguen ciegamente, los DDHH, que deben ser priorizados y mas respetados que cualquier otra cosa, siguen violandose y utilizandose como pretexto de complots de los estafadores politicos.
					
					La historia castigara severamente a EE.UU., que partiendo de su siniestra intencion, impide el desarrollo democratico, la prosperidad y la garantia de DDHH y destruye gravemente la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el ministro de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea hablo de que "el Norte de Corea no sera reconocido eternamente como pais poseedor de armas nucleares". Otros compinches de esta banda dijeron que deben "recalificar el Norte de Corea de un pais que apoya al terrorismo" en relacion con el resultado de la presenta ronda de las conversaciones a 6 bandas.
					Esto no pasa de ser un proceder insignificante de los que tienen la hostilidad a los connacionales y la conciencia del enfrentamiento con estos y demuestra solo el sucio intento de la banda de Lee que se opone  sin ton ni son a los connacionales interviniendo en los asuntos que no tienen nada que ver con ellos mismos.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					Esta vez, EE.UU. declaro la RPDC como pais poseedor de armas nucleares, lo cual es una realidad evidente.
					
					Tal publicacion de EE.UU. puede ser para las autoridades surcoreanas un motivo de cambiar su anacronica "politica sobre el Norte de Corea" so  pretexto del problema nuclear. Pero, la banda de Lee agrava aun mas el enfrentamiento con el Norte cuestionandolo. Esto prueba patentemente que esta horda no desea la reconciliacion, la unidad, la paz y la reunificacion entre Norte-Sur sino abriga el intento de tomar el camino de enfrentamiento y la guerra contra el Norte de Corea en coligacion con EE.UU.
					
					Ellos actuan con frenesi para acarrear la catastrofe a los connacionales y llevar al fracaso cosas de estos de todas maneras. Por esta razon, dialogar con ellos sera una cosa vana.
					
					El designio negro de la banda de Lee y su mala concepcion sobre los connacionales prueban que ellos no tienen la voluntad de dialogar y cooperar con la RPDC.
					
					Para los traidores que nadan contra la corriente de la epoca les tocara solo la autodestruccion. La banda de Lee debe distinguir claramente la realidad y actuar con prudencia.
